subject: Implement Provisioning State Machine
description:
Replace simple status with step-aware provisioning:
1. Create /home/ken/control-plane-api/src/lib/provisioning/state-machine.ts
2. Add provisioning_steps table: step_name, status, error_details, retry_count
3. Define ordered steps: create_tenant, create_schema, create_storage_namespace, register_auth, register_realtime, generate_keys, verify_services
4. Implement state transitions: PENDING → RUNNING → SUCCESS/FAILED
5. Add retry from failed step capability
6. Create UI showing progress bar with step-by-step status
7. Update provisioning API to use state machine

This enables safe retry from failure and better UX.
